"Blender Challenge: Create a realistic portrait of your favorite celebrity in just one hour!"
"Blender Jam: Collaborate with other artists to create a short film or animation in just 48 hours!"
"Blender Art Show: Showcase your best Blender creations and receive feedback from industry professionals!"
"Blender Design Challenge: Use Blender to design a product or concept and present it to a panel of judges!"
"Blender Education Workshop: Learn how to use Blender to create stunning visual effects and animations!"
